summary: Frontend testing completed successfully for ServiceManager app. All requested features are working correctly: Results page displays monetary amounts (kr), summary cards show Fakturagrunnlag/Provisjon/Andel/Intern lønn/Margin, employee breakdown table has all required columns, month selector works, and Route planner print button (Skriv ut kjøreseddel) opens print window with formatted content.
critical_code_review_comments: Results.js: Good implementation with proper data-testid attributes
Routes.js: Print function (handlePrintTravelNote) correctly opens new window with formatted HTML content
Both pages have proper loading states and error handling
context_for_next_testing_agent: All features tested and working. Login with test@test.com/test. Results page shows kr amounts with month selector. Route planner has multiple routes with print functionality working.

results_page.monetary_amounts_kr: PASS - All amounts displayed in kr format
results_page.month_selector: PASS - Changes data when month is selected

route_planner.print_button_clickable: PASS - Button is enabled and clickable
route_planner.print_opens_new_window: PASS - Opens popup with formatted Kjøreseddel content
route_planner.routes_show_customer_details: PASS - Shows customer name, address, stop numbers
